name: Jun
title: The Sky Guardian
subtitle: A divine warrior who commands the power of light and protection
lore: A powerful guardian who harnesses divine energy to protect her allies and strike down her foes. Jun's mastery over light and her faithful avian companion allow her to scout the battlefield while providing crucial support to her team. Her unique blend of defensive abilities and divine retribution makes her a formidable presence in any conflict.

passive.name: Sky Scout
passive.description: Jun starts with an item that allows her to summon a bird. She can send it in a designated direction to provide vision for her team. The bird can be moved every [60s]. When the bird is active, Jun gains [20/25/30/35/40%] bonus movement speed and slows and stuns are half as effective.

Q.name: Divine Retribution
Q.description: Upon activation, Jun unleashes a radiant arc across the last enemy she damaged, dealing [100/200/350/500/815] damage. Jun heals for [3.5% of her max HP] whenever she activates Q. Additionally, she gains [25%] bonus movement speed upon using the ability, which decays over [3s].

W.name: Counter Strike
W.description: Jun parries the next melee basic attack and empowers her next basic attack, dealing [50%] more damage. If the parry is successful, she dashes 75 units in the direction of her cursor, granting a brief repositioning boost.

E.name: Shield of Hope
E.description: Jun summons a protective shield around her that absorbs [150/250/420/550/785/1050] damage. If the shield is broken, it explodes, dealing [30/110/200/285/340/440] damage to nearby enemies.

R.name: Divine Light
R.description: Jun shoots a ray of light from her hands, which slows every enemy it hits by [25%] for [2.5s] and also deals [4%] of their current HP twice in [1] second. She heals [100%] of the damage dealt to herself.

1.name: Enhanced Scout
1.description: The Sky Scout provides a larger area of vision.

1.name: Quick Retribution
1.description: The cooldown of the Q ability is reduced from [9s] to [6s].

1.name: Explosive Shield
1.description: The E shield provides [50%] less protection but deals [70%] more damage when it explodes.

5.name: Attack Speed Quest
5.description: Quest: Deal 7500 damage with basic attacks -> Jun's Attack Speed scaling changes from 0.04 to [0.055].

5.name: Defense Quest
5.description: Quest: Deal 7500 damage with basic attacks -> Jun now blocks [7%] of all incoming damage.

5.name: Regeneration Quest
5.description: Quest: Deal 7500 damage with basic attacks -> Jun regenerates [90 HP] per second.

10.name: Divine Protection
10.description: Jun becomes invulnerable when casting her R ability.

10.name: Healing Light
10.description: Jun can heal allies with Ray of Light for [600/900/1300/1850].

15.name: Quick Counter
15.description: Counter Strike ability's cooldown is decreased by 3s.

15.name: Pure Defense
15.description: The Shield of Hope ability's cooldown is reduced by [7s], but it no longer deals damage.

15.name: Enhanced Shield
15.description: The Shield of Hope provides [14%] more shield strength.

20.name: Unknown
20.description: After Jun's death, she transforms into "Unknown" for [10s]. During this time, she can only use autoattacks and the Q ability, but her damage is reduced by [90%].

20.name: Enhanced Recovery
20.description: Healing received by Jun is increased by [14%].

20.name: Double Scout
20.description: Two Sky Scouts can be used.

20.name: Divine Mastery
20.description: Your ultimate ability now has 2 charges.
